name: SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Fireteam Bravo 2
name_original: SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Fireteam Bravo 2
description:
Wherever Freedom Is Threatened, the SEALs Are There.
• Experience unparalleled realism with over 40 real world weapons and new Command Equity and Local Influence reward systems
• Battle through thrilling, single player and multiplayer maps, as well as three new multiplayer game types (Tug of War, Intel Grab, Target) playable in Infrastructure and Ad Hoc modes
• Crosstalk with SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Combined Assault (for the PlayStation®2), including all new action events and unlockables
*For wireless play, this game may not be compatible with the UMD disc version of the game.
Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.
SOCOM U.S. Navy SEALs: Fireteam Bravo 2 © 2006 Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. Developed by Zipper Interactive, Inc. Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PLAYSTATION®Network Terms of Service, this item’s use restrictions, and other terms and conditions located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
Multi-player and all online features for this product are no longer available.
